domain.name: Brand Vertical
domain.description: Top level entities that describe a Brands industry

text: @Surgeon_General Are you seriously suggesting I call my doctor and ask him if it’s ok to mainline Clorox to kill the coronavirus? Are. You. Seriously. Suggesting. That? If that’s your considered opinion then you should resign because you’re as batsh*t crazy as the CIC.
